mapper.select: SELECT A.id , A.name , A.price FROM menu A INNER JOIN menu_group B ON A.menu_group_id = B.id WHERE A.id IN #{item.menuId} AND B.restaurant_id = #{restaurantId}
SELECT SUM(B.price * B.count) AS totalPrice FROM reservation A INNER JOIN order_menu B ON A.id = B.reservation_id WHERE A.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation(rsrv_date, rsrv_time, rsrv_count, status, users_id, restaurant_id) VALUES (#{reservationDate}, #{reservationTime}, #{peopleCount}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{restaurantId})

INSERT INTO order_menu(reservation_id, menu_id, menu_name, price, count) VALUES
(#{item.reservationId}, #{item.menuId}, #{item.menuName}, #{item.price}, #{item.count})
mapper.delete: DELETE A, B FROM reservation A LEFT OUTER JOIN order_menu B ON A.id = B.reservation_id WHERE A.id = #{id}
